
# Notion Event Scrapper 

This project was developed to automate the sourcing and uploading of events to the Senda Notion CRM. 

For an in depth understanding of the APIs used, please refer to the documentation provided.

## Documentation

 - [PredictHQ](https://docs.predicthq.com/webapp-support/webapp-overview/api-tools)
 - [Serp API](https://serpapi.com/)
